meta.notes: All new rules must be recorded in BOTH CLAUDE.md and this config. Never add a rule to only one location.

best_practices.file_ownership: Each parallel phase must own distinct files. Shared files assigned to ONE phase only.
best_practices.integration_branch: After parallel phases complete, merge one-by-one into milestone/vX.Y branch.
best_practices.conflict_resolution: File owner phase takes priority. Shared files merged manually.
best_practices.test_after_merge: Run tsc --noEmit and eslint after each merge.
best_practices.polish_on_integration: Polish runs on the final integrated branch, not individual phase branches.

parallel_phases.notes: User prefers running independent phases in parallel via separate Claude Code terminals on separate branches. Only parallelize phases with no shared file dependencies.

git.notes: NEVER merge directly to main. Always create PR. User reviews and merges manually. NEVER delete branches - preserve for history. Use squash merge to keep main clean.

milestone_pr.includes: All phase changes + polish commits in single consolidated PR to main

polish.notes: Run /polish-milestone after each milestone. Steps must run sequentially to avoid conflicts. Final step creates consolidated milestone PR to main.

workflow.add: Detect feature/bug requests in plain language → call /gsd:add-todo → create structured markdown
workflow.list: Raw prompt 'show todos' or /gsd:check-todos → list with areas/age → allow selection
workflow.work: Raw prompt 'start working on X' → find matching todo → move to done/ → load context → begin implementation

todos.notes: Support both CLI commands and raw prompts. Future-proof by following GSD pattern: capture → store → route to action.
